# Timing thresholds for different environments (in seconds)
# Format: <config-file-name>: <threshold_seconds>

# Default threshold
default: 420

# Client configurations
op-default: 420
op-succinct: 480
fork12-cdk-erigon-sovereign: 320
fork12-cdk-erigon-validium: 380
fork12-cdk-erigon-rolup: 350

# Additional services configurations
additional-services: 440
